import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import api from './services/api' import './global.css' import './App.css' import './Main.css' import './sideBar.css' function App() { const [github_username, setGithub_username] = useState('') const [techs, setTechs] = useState('') const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState('') const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState('') useEffect(() => { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { const { latitude, longitude } = position.coords setLatitude(latitude) setLongitude(longitude) }, (err) => { console.log(err) }, { timeout: 30000, } ) }, []) async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const response = await api.post('/devs', { github_username, techs, latitude, longitude }) } return (
Cadastrar
setGithub_username(e.target.value)} />
